title: findvlad
author: findvlad
content: Any trace of the scammer Vladislav Alimpiev other members of the scam company Localbitcoins?I need complete address of him or other managers of the fraud company LBC.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: findvlad on November 19, 2023, 10:20:25 AMI need complete address of him Go and file a report with the police!But of course, you won't since you don't have any proof for it and instead open the 100th topic here probably either for some blackmail or maybe you have some weird fetish with it .Get over it, a dozen topics this year alone is enough:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5440307.msg61781700#msg61781700https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5452613.msg62238506#msg62238506https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5432609.msg61526451#msg61526451

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: The fact that you are too stupid to know what the best course of action is even when advised by other people, so many times, simply means you are just a time waster here. You look more like a troll after opening that many threads with different accounts and not following any piece of advice.
